Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.viewables

Class DevelopmentCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.viewables.DevelopmentCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Viewable
public class DevelopmentCard extends Object implements Viewable
This class creates the viewable of the development card used in DevelopmentSpace and DevelopmentSpaceGrid

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(int[] update)
      Updates the viewable using numbers from the getStatus (if the id is 0 the card is empty)
      Specified by:
      update in interface Viewable
      Parameters:
      update - array composed by the id of the card (used to update the cost, category, level and win points of the card, those info are from the development cards file) and other 15 int to update the card production

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Prints the development card
      Specified by:
      toString in interface Viewable
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      string with the development card

    • categoryToColor

      public String categoryToColor()
      Associates a color (from Style) to the category of the card
      Returns:
      the color of the category

    • deleteZeros

      private String deleteZeros​(int i, WarehouseObjectType wot)
      Helps to "compress" the string, so we have "" if the resource does not exist and we don't have empty spaces
      Parameters:
      i - index of the production (mutableInput1(0)/mutableInput2(1)/mutableOutput(2))
      wot - type of resource, used to convert resource in colour
      Returns:
      one marker for the type of resource or an empty string if the resource does not exist

    • calculateSpaces

      private String calculateSpaces​(int i, WarehouseObjectType wot)
      Calculate the spaces to have a proportioned card. If that resource is not in the production, we have to substitute with three empty spaces to put the production in the centre
      Parameters:
      i - input/output/currentSupply
      wot - resource chosen
      Returns:
      three spaces for every resource not existent in the prod

    • printOnlyNotNull

      private String printOnlyNotNull()
      Prints an empty card if the id is zero and if not, print the card using all helper methods
      Returns:
      the string describing the development card

    • printWinPoints

      private String printWinPoints()
      Print the number of win points considering the occurrence of a double digit
      Returns:
      the number of win points framed and the right number of spaces to not ruin the shape of the card
